entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 30 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
